page.title: 01LANDSCAPE AND TRADE
page.content: This hilly area lies a short distance inland from the North Wales coast between the Market Town of Abergele in the North and the Valley of the River Elwy to the South. The whole area is farmland except for a few small areas of woodland. There are {no towns or villages}in the area but a number of scattered farmhouses and cottages.{Amenities}in the area are consequentley very few, with the people visiting the nearby coastal towns for most of their requirements. An investigation into the shopping habits of the people in this area revealed the following pattern: For groceries, meat, fruit and vegetables, almost all the people in the area (97%) shopped in Abergele, Rhyl and the Asda supermarket in Kinmel Bay.
